alert.note: Alert for Gage; Lancaster; Saline; Seward (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 12 at 7:00PM CDT until April 12 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Lancaster County in southeastern Nebraska... Southeastern Seward County in southeastern Nebraska... Saline County in southeastern Nebraska... Northwestern Gage County in southeastern Nebraska... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 659 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Dorchester to 5 miles west of Western, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Dorchester around 705 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Wilber, De Witt, Clatonia, Crete, Hallam, Cortland and Hickman. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
